snippet: The average annual premium for a family rose 4 percent this year and 5 percent for individuals.
abstract: Kaiser Family Foundation survey shows that premiums for employer-provided health insurance have increased by relatively modest amounts for 2013, further sign that health care inflation has abated; average annual premium for family rose 4 percent and 5 percent for individuals.
lead_paragraph: The average annual premium for a family rose 4 percent this year and 5 percent for individuals.

headline.main: Health Care Costs Climb Moderately, Survey Says
headline.print_headline: Health Care Costs Climb Moderately, Survey Says

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject
